title: The Next Ultimate Skin (This is only a theory)
body:
So far we have Spirit Guard {{champion:77}} (Jungle), Pulsefire {{champion:81}} (ADC) and DJ {{champion:37}} (Support).

Riot Games was founded by Marc 'Tryndamere / {{champion:23}}' Merrill and Brandon 'Ryze / {{champion:13}}' Beck.

This is just a guess, but a guess I really want to be true, that {{champion:23}} and {{champion:13}} are the new upcoming ultimate skins.

And it would work. {{champion:23}} Top, {{champion:77}} Jungle, {{champion:13}} Mid, {{champion:81}} ADC and {{champion:37}} Support.

So What I want to know is if you guys agree and If so, some ideas on what these skins could be.

replies.body: I like to tell myself a Zac skin is coming... One day... :'(
new zac skins got released literally today lol
I posted this a few hours before it was announced :P
Oh please be Zac. We need another Zac skin. He only has one and it's pretty bad IMO

Pool Party Zac is coming

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/06/69-pbe-update.html

https://youtu.be/B-QXY0flj0A
Ryze deserves an ultimate skin. The skin treatment Ryze has gotten so far is trash. It's like as if they hate him. None of his skins to date really change anything but model...
HIPPIE ZILEAN, IT'S GROOVY ZILEAN BUT BETTER! THIS IS A NECESSARY THING!

You wat i'd like to see:
Reborn Ryze 
OR
Foe Bringer Tryndamere
